channel.title: Download help
channel.description: Hello I just am getting back into rsps. I want to mess around with a source and code. I am having a problem downloading sources... when I download one It doesn't go into a folder or anything it goes straight to a notepad. How do I fix that? Or is it not a problem? I cant really edit anything, change stuff.

item.title: Download help
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

I don’t understand your problem.

When you say you downloaded the source, did you extract it from the archive?

When you say it doesn’t go into the folder, I don’t understand please explain further.

When you say it goes straight to a notepad, does opening a file with in the folder or archive do this?

Read full topic

item.title: Download help
